name: Aamon
description:
This model aims to be good at generating faces, this is my second model on civit.

The model can make realistic images, which is bright and detailed

I recommend you to use dpm Karras series sampler and cfg scale 8.5 for the best results

Works good with Lora's. Might generate good small texts in images with good prompt.

If you want to support me you can use my models at mage where they pay me on each generation. Thank you for your support.
